content: Hello,This is an introductory inject. You have 10 minutes to read this and familiarize yourselves with the platform. Injects like this represent events in the simulated world of this exercise. You can interact with the world using the tool CLI in the right part of your screen. To use a tool, select one from the panel on the very right. This will print the tools prefix into the console. Every prefix must be followed by an argument, depending on the tool youre using. Hover over the tool to see its usage.The example usage of browser, for instance, would be VISIT some.page.com. There is an exception to this in the email tool which takes two arguments, the recipients address, and the email content (EMAIL TO aaa@bbb.com Hello, this is the content of the email.).Rules:    - Make sure that you always have your team number selected in the top left corner. Switching to other teams is prohibited and will be monitored.    - Only have this page open on one of the computers in your group.    - Cooperate only with your teammates.    - Do not try to intentionally "break" the exercise, you may damage the experience for the entire group.    - Be patient and do not spam commands into the CLI, the content you see only refreshes every 5 seconds.Guidelines    - Use Firefox browser for optimal experience    - Discuss every action you take with your teammates.    - You do not have to successfully complete the exercise, in order to get a credit. You do, however, have to show dedication and actively participate in the exercise. Cheating or tampering with the exercise will only damage yours and others experience.    - There is not a strict end goal in this exercise. Even after you believe you have finished it, think about what else could be done and keep exploring.    - If you are struggling with a tool, read its tooltip by hovering over it. If there are further issues, contact the instructors.    - You can only send an email to one address at the time, make sure to read the EMAIL tooltip for correct usage.    - The tool panel in the right section of your screen is scrollable (you may not see all the tools at once if you have smaller resolution).    - The real length of the exercise is 5 minutes shorter than the timer shows (a reminder inject will be sent). Use those last 5 minutes to ***save the html*** of this page, you will need it in later exercises. This page will no longer be accessible once the exercise concludes.In case you think you are having trouble with the technical part of the exercise, ask the instructors in person, or write a simulated email to instructors@help.com.Once you read this, test your understanding of the CLI and tools by sending a test email with some content to the instructors@help.com address. Instructors
EMAIL TO instructors@help.com Test email.
Email to instructors was sent, wait for reply.
Thanks :)
VISIT uni.ex
Website unreachable.
EMAIL TO instructors@help.com Test email attempt 2.
Email to instructors was sent, wait for reply.
Hi, thanks for the second email
VISIT uni.ex
Website unreachable.
Greetings,please see attached one of phishing mails with forged sender and a link to your website. Please have a look at that.Thanks,FREEMAIL provider
VISIT nice-project.uni.ex

Dear CSIRT-U,Im forwarding yet another phishing mail.Best regards,--Dr. DoeFaculty of ScienceOn 30.8.2021 23:17, Admin <mailto:it_department@mail.ex> wrote:https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.exhttps://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.exhttps://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.exYour Account will soon be suspendedYour allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account.doe@mail.uni.exPlease kindly verify you are Human and not a robot by following the below link, so we can get your account running normal and retreive all pending mails.https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex<="" account="">Note: You must verify your account using webmail to enable you access your account after 12:00AM before you can send mail.If no action is taken, you may cease to receive incoming emailsThis Email was sent to doe@mail.uni.ex as a User from mail.uni.exSincerelymail.uni.ex support team.
VISIT nice-project.uni.ex/birthdays.txt
VISIT nice-project.uni.ex/schema.jpg
Website unreachable.
VISIT nice-project.uni.ex/settings
DNS nice-project.uni.ex
BLOCK TRAFFIC TO 198.51.100.40
DONE

To: jane.taylor@mail.uni.exSubject: Suspicious content of our project homepageGreetings,could you please investigate what happened at our website? When I visited our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/ an hour ago, I could see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation. Now I suddenly cannot access the website at all.Thanks a lot!Jane Taylorproject managerNice project
EMAIL TO instructors@help.com What is the email for data protection officer?
Email to instructors was sent, wait for reply.
Just a reminter, the email address for the general data protection officer is dpo@mail.uni.ex
I sent a notification to all teams regarding the issue
EMAIL TO dpo@mail.uni.ex Greetings, on the website nice-project.uni.ex/birthdays.txt were publicly accessible personal data about university staff or students. We blocked the traffic for now.
Email was sent, wait for reply.
WHO IS RESPONSIBLE FOR nice-project.uni.ex
cloud@uni.ex
Dear CSIRT-U,thanks for reporting this incident. I will take a look at this ASAP.Sincerely,Kim HoffmanData Protection Officer

EMAIL TO cloud@uni.ex Greetings, during our investigation we found phishing targeting our university. The domain nice-project.uni.ex was probably compromised and we blocked it for now. On the website nice-project.uni.ex/birthdays.txt were publicly accessible personal data about university staff or students.
Email was sent, wait for reply.

EMAIL TO jane.taylor@mail.uni.ex Greetings, thanks for your email, we know about the issue. The website was probably compromised and used as a phishing site, therefore weve blocked the traffic for the website. We are investigating the issue and we will contact you when the issue is resolved.
Email was sent, wait for reply.
The admin of the VM running the website is harris@mail.uni.exBest,Cloud provider
WHICH IPS VISITED nice-project.uni.ex
No IPs visited this website
Oh no, we need to have our website up as soon as possible!Regards,Jane Taylorproject managerNice project

EMAIL TO harris@mail.uni.ex Greetings, during our investigation we found phishing targeting our university. The domain nice-project.uni.ex was probably compromised and we blocked it for now. On the website nice-project.uni.ex/birthdays.txt were publicly accessible personal data about university staff or students. Are you aware of the issue?
Email was sent, wait for reply.

Email was sent, wait for reply.
Hello, I doubt that it could happen, but I will change the credentials just to be sure, thank you for notifying me. I will redeploy te application first thing tomorrow.
Hello, that would be great, thank you.Jane Taylor

EMAIL TO lisa.grant@mail.uni.ex Greetings, no need to reinstall your computer, just change your password on all sites you use that password on, mainly the university website.
Email was sent, wait for reply.
Greetings,okay, I will change my passowrds, thank you.BestRegards,Lisa Grant

The exercise will conclude in one minute.Instructors

The exercise is over. Do not send further commands.Use the last 5 minutes to download the html of this website (you will need it for further analysis in the next exercise). Ensure you can open it and that it contains all your interactions with the system.Instructors
